info panel nothing found: Nothing found. Check your search query.
info panel start typing: Start typing into a search dialog to show results.
placeholder: Type IRI or search for label. You can even use regular expressions.
title: Class search

wikidata.boost classes tooltip: Boosts classes that have many instances and external ontology mappings.
wikidata.boost common tooltip: The slider defines a portion of a final result score that is assigned to a boost score . The left side denotes no boost, the right side denotes the max boost of 90% (meaning the 90% of the final score consists of the boost score, the rest 10% is from the query score). The step is 10%
wikidata.boost properties tooltip: Boosts properties that have many usages on instances and external ontology mappings.
wikidata.placeholder: Describe the class using keywords, short description, or both. You can also insert IRI.
wikidata.properties: The class must contain these properties
wikidata.property input: Type IRI or search for a label.
wikidata.search error: There was an error during search.
